actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to remove Members of Congress from the purview of section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967, relating to the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Salary Act of 1967 to repeal the authority of the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries to review the pay rates of Members of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to remove Members of Congress from the purview of section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967, relating to the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries, and for other purposes.
